00028 #ifndef __PLAT_CLOCK_H__
00029 #define __PLAT_CLOCK_H__
00030 
00036 #ifdef CLOCK_SPEED_7_37
00037 //a few defines which make calculations easier....
00038 #define CLOCK_SPEED      (uint32_t)7372800
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #ifdef CLOCK_SPEED_3_68
00042 #define CLOCK_SPEED      (uint32_t)3686400
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 #ifdef CLOCK_SPEED_4_0
00046 #define CLOCK_SPEED      (uint32_t)4000000
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #define CLOCK_SPEED_0    CLOCK_SPEED //no prescaling
00050 #define CLOCK_SPEED_8    (CLOCK_SPEED /    (uint32_t)8)
00051 #define CLOCK_SPEED_32   (CLOCK_SPEED /   (uint32_t)32)
00052 #define CLOCK_SPEED_64   (CLOCK_SPEED /   (uint32_t)64)
00053 #define CLOCK_SPEED_128  (CLOCK_SPEED /  (uint32_t)128)
00054 #define CLOCK_SPEED_256  (CLOCK_SPEED /  (uint32_t)256)
00055 #define CLOCK_SPEED_1024 (CLOCK_SPEED /  (uint32_t)1024)
00056 
00057 #define EXT_CLOCK      32768
00058 #define EXT_CLOCK_0    EXT_CLOCK //no prescaling
00059 #define EXT_CLOCK_8    (EXT_CLOCK /    8)
00060 #define EXT_CLOCK_32   (EXT_CLOCK /   32)
00061 #define EXT_CLOCK_64   (EXT_CLOCK /   64)
00062 #define EXT_CLOCK_128  (EXT_CLOCK /  128)
00063 #define EXT_CLOCK_256  (EXT_CLOCK /  256)
00064 #define EXT_CLOCK_1024 (EXT_CLOCK / 1024)
00065 
00066 #ifdef CLOCK_SPEED_7_37
00067 #define TIMESLICE_20_MS 144 // value of OCR at 1024 prescaler for 20ms timeslice
00068 //#define TIMESLICE_20_MS 216 // 30 ms
00069 //#define TIMESLICE_20_MS 72 // 10 ms
00070 //#define TIMESLICE_20_MS 288 // 40 ms
00071 //#define TIMESLICE_20_MS 360 // 50 ms
00072 #else

00074 #define TIMESLICE_20_MS 72
00075 #  else
00076 #  ifdef CLOCK_SPEED_4_0
00077 #define TIMESLICE_20_MS 80
00078 #  else

00080 #  endif
